results.name: a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1, and for n>=2, a(n) = (n-2)*a(n-1) - (n-1)*a(n-2).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..452
formula: a(n) = (-1)^(n+1)*C(n-1, 1) where C(n, x) are the Charlier polynomials (with parameter a=1) as given in A137338. (Evaluation at x = -1 gives the left factorials A003422.) - _Peter Luschny_, Nov 28 2018
maple: C := proc(n, x) option remember; if n > 0 then (x-n)*C(n-1, x)-n*C(n-2, x)
elif n = 0 then 1 else 0 fi end: A232845 := n -> (-1)^(n+1)*C(n-1, 1):
